ygData.subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I promise this won t become the whineplay forum... Can someone point out a negative of the iksar?  All I see so far is the 20% exp penatly.  And they re
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I promise this won't become the whineplay forum...

Can someone point out a negative of the iksar? All I see so far is the 20%
exp penatly. And they're butt ugly :)



-----Original Message-----
From: John Carney [mailto:jcarney@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 5:16 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?


Because the BASE is 100, not 0.

100 + (Level * 5) = 120 at level 4.

If the skill maxes out at 200, then at level 20 Iksar will stop getting
swimming increases: 100 + (20 * 5) = 200.

see?

-----Original Message-----
From: ug@... [mailto:ug@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 4:56 PM
To: EQ-Monks@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] swimming skill?


Dizzy J. writes:

> most likely when you get to lvl 24 your swimming skill will start to
> increase again.

I understand what you're getting at here, but this makes me wonder why
it would increase from 100 to 120 in the first place.
